title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Multidisciplinary Collaborative Project-Based Education for Patient Safety

context.prior_knowledge: Basic professional knowledge in medical/legal/technical fields and teamwork experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three systemic error factors by collaborating with an interdisciplinary team to analyze real patient safety cases.
Learners can develop action plans for improving patient safety and share them with team members using smartphone-based collaboration tools.
Within four weeks after training, learners can apply at least two learned patient safety protocols in real work environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
